meanings.definition: Superlative form of spin, meaning to rotate quickly around an axis.
meanings.sent1: She spinniest the top and watched it whirl around.
meanings.sent2: The dancer spinniest on her toes gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to spinniest after its tail, but it kept slipping away.
meanings.sent4: The tornado spinniest through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The merry-go-round was the spinniest ride at the fair.

meanings.definition: Comparative form of spin, meaning to twist or turn rapidly.
meanings.sent1: He spinniest the basketball on his finger longer than anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The figure skater spinniest beautifully on the ice.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to spinniest the pizza dough quickly to get it just right.
meanings.sent4: The record player needle spinniest around the vinyl, playing sweet music.
meanings.sent5: The toy top spinniest faster than all the others.

meanings.definition: Most likely to spin or rotate quickly.
meanings.sent1: The spinniest chair at the amusement park made everyone dizzy.
meanings.sent2: The spinniest ride at the carnival was the teacup spin.
meanings.sent3: The spinniest toy in the box was the colorful pinwheel.
meanings.sent4: The spinniest carousel horse went up and down with joy.
meanings.sent5: The spinniest fan in the room cooled us down on a hot day.
